name: Free Color Icons
description:
With this free pack of Color Icons, you can boost any project with a colorful touch. Check the icon mixer, and create thousands of vector icons.


Combine and mix thousands of vector icons in both SVG and PNG to get unlimited creative icon packs with tons of styles like: iOS, Material, Flat, Line Icons, Windows, Fluent, and more.


Highlights


  • Easy to edit and change colors
  • Organized components
  • Icons are scalable to any size you need
  • Easy to use for developers
  • Well organized icon names


Create your own icons with the icon mixer


Get a 2 million lifetime icon pack at a discounted price
